description: SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.
name: HSPC Allergy Intolerance Type Value Set

text.div:
HSPC Allergy Intolerance Type Value Set

SELECT SNOMED CT and Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    419199007Allergy to substance (disorder)
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-allergyintolerancetype
